body_html:
@JafferWilson What is your PATH? Suppose it is abcdasdjsakdkasjkdjaskd, then it should be C:\Python35;C:\Python35\Scripts;C:\Python35\bin;C:\Python35\Library\bin;abcdasdjsakdkasjkdjaskd.
The problem is that the two environments messed up with each other. You really should avoid this to happen.

body:
@JafferWilson What is your PATH? Suppose it is `abcdasdjsakdkasjkdjaskd`, then it should be `C:\Python35;C:\Python35\Scripts;C:\Python35\bin;C:\Python35\Library\bin;abcdasdjsakdkasjkdjaskd`.
The problem is that the two environments messed up with each other. You really should avoid this to happen.
